name: Mad Lab Arena
description:
Hello FPS Jammers, coming to you from the infamously known Labody Inc. universe we present you our next project, this time for the 7DFPS Game Jam 2022.

Initially we planned to make an Arena Shooter but due to internal complications we had to scramble in the last hours and turned this project into something a little different.

Our Game: Mad Lab Arena Genre: Platformer Controls:

LMB - shoot
WASD - move
SPACE - jump
SHIFT - boost (works in the air too)

Description:

This game is a first person platformer, in which you have to finish increasingly difficult levels, where you jump from one platform to another and hit targets, but be careful of some fierce experiments (creatures built in the labs). Finally you reach the end of the game and get access to the next level.

Can you reach and clear the MAD LAB ARENA?

Credits:

Prayer90 - Team Lead, 3D Artist, Programmer, Level Designer
WildRikku - Lead Programmer
PhilterPhil - 2D and 3D Artist
RLP - Name Finding, UI Designer, Lead Level Designer

Software used:

Game Engine - Unity 2021.3.14f1
Blender 3D - 3D Modelling, Unwrapping
Graphics - Photoshop, Aseprite

Submission and ratings:

https://itch.io/jam/7dfps-2022/rate/1841355
